COMMAND.NAME: setstyle
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.
COMMAND.DESCRIPTION: Set the style of text of the passed buffer. If the given end position is less than the start position, the positions will be reversed. If any position is out of range, it will be forced in range.
COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer. startPosition is not provided.
endPosition is not provided.
styleNum is not provided.
